metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Tennessee Waltz has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity and Melodic Complexity and below-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
